venue.name: Myles Standish State Forest fire tower

item.description:
Join the Park Interpreter on a hike through Myles Standish State Forest.  This hike travels along different trails each week and is about 3 to 4 miles in length.  Please wear bug spray, sunscreen, and supportive shoes.  Bring along water and a snack.  We’ll meet at the Fire Tower parking lot #6.
All programs are free and open to the public. Rain cancels. An adult must accompany children.  Reasonable accommodations available upon request.  For more information, call the Park Interpreters at (508) 866-2580 or visit http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/southeast/mssf.htm.
item.how_to_find_us: The fire tower is off Bare Hill Road at the intersection with Three Cornered Pond Road.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Off the Beaten Path- Fire Tower
